title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage saving and investment, and for other purposes.
content: Investment Incentives Act of 2002 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) increase from $1,500 to $10,000 the limitation on capital losses allowed against ordinary income. (2) make the increase to the $5,000 amount allowed as an annual retirement contribution deduction effective immediately, instead of starting in 2008, (3) exclude from gross income $500 of dividends and interest.
